easy.title: The Quiet Companion
easy.question: I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with wind. What am I?

medium.title: Fill in the Sequence
medium.question: What comes next in the sequence: 2, 3, 5, 8, 12, 17, ___?

hard.title: The Bridge Crossing
hard.question: Four people need to cross a bridge at night. They have one flashlight, and only two people can cross at a time. They take 1, 2, 7, and 10 minutes respectively. What's the shortest time to get everyone across?
hard.answer: 17 minutes. (1 & 2 cross → 1 returns → 7 & 10 cross → 2 returns → 1 & 2 cross again)
